meanings.definition: To come into existence or notice
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the sun arises in the east.
meanings.sent2: The opportunity to succeed arises when you work hard.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog arises in silly cartoons.
meanings.sent4: Hope arises like a phoenix from the ashes of despair.
meanings.sent5: A sense of wonder arises when you gaze at the stars.

meanings.definition: To originate or stem from a source
meanings.sent1: The river arises from the mountain springs.
meanings.sent2: His success arises from his dedication and perseverance.
meanings.sent3: Laughter arises from the comedian's witty jokes.
meanings.sent4: Trust arises from honesty and transparency.
meanings.sent5: Understanding arises from asking questions and seeking answers.

meanings.sent1: The hot air balloon arises slowly into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The smoke arises from the chimney on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: Confetti arises in celebration, filling the air with color.
meanings.sent4: The moon arises gracefully over the horizon at night.
meanings.sent5: The elevator arises smoothly to the top floor of the building.

meanings.definition: To result or occur as a consequence
meanings.sent2: Chaos arises when order is neglected.
meanings.sent3: Laughter arises from the unexpected antics of a playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Success arises from perseverance and hard work.
meanings.sent5: Confidence arises when you face your fears and overcome them.
